mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_stats_today (full_short_url, gid, date, today_uv, today_pv, today_uip, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{linkTodayStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkTodayStats.gid}, #{linkTodayStats.date}, #{linkTodayStats.todayUv}, #{linkTodayStats.todayPv}, #{linkTodayStats.todayUip}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE today_uv = today_uv + #{linkTodayStats.todayUv}, today_pv = today_pv + #{linkTodayStats.todayPv}, today_uip = today_uip + #{linkTodayStats.todayUip}, update_time = NOW();;
